user_profile: User 106 is an introverted female in her late 20s to early 30s who values personal time spent at home and enjoys self-care activities. She exhibits conscientious behavior by maintaining a consistent routine of visiting hair salons, indicating an interest in personal grooming. User 106 prefers intimate social settings over large crowds, participating in regular visits to bars and diners with close friends. Her routine reflects a balanced lifestyle, blending home activities with occasional outings, predominantly to coffee shops and American restaurants. With a background in higher education, she belongs to the middle socioeconomic level, indicating a certain level of stability and awareness of lifestyle choices. User 106 appreciates new experiences, as shown by her openness to exploring local eateries. Key locations she may visit in the future include more neighborhood spots and food/drink establishments where she can socialize in comfortable environments.
